OTTAWA,

DEPARTMENT OF INDIAN AFFAIRS,

LIBRARY.

1. All books borrowed from the Library must be duly registered.

2. Only one book allowed to be taken out at a time.

3. Books borrowed to be returned within a fortnight.

4. Books can be renewed for a fortnight if not required by other readers. Renewals must be registered.

5. All injuries to books loaned, beyond reasonable wear, and all losses, shall be promptly made good.
KATOLIK

AYAMIHEWIMASINAHIGAN

NEHIYAWEWINK

LIVRE DE PRIÈRES EN LONQUE CRISE

CUSTODIAM LEGAM TUAM SEMPER.

Kakike ni gu ganweyittten klt Itasiwewin.

MONIYAK

G. O. BEAUCHEMIN & FILS

Wetasinhikewâtjik

1885

TATTO PIPUN ASPIN KA NITTAWIKIT JESUS
LETTRES DE L'ALPHABET CRISI.

A. Long, v. g. apisissia, il ressuscite.
" " " à la fin d'un mot : niskâ, outarde.
A. Bref " anotch, aujourd'hui.
B. " " nábew, homme, sisib, canard.
C. " " náspitch, beaucoup, kitchi, afin que.
D. " " kimodiw, il dérobe.
E. Toujours accentué, v. g. tande ? où ? sipwette, parts.
G. Masinahigán, livre.
H. Sákihew, il l'aime.
I. Long, sisib, canard.
J. Bref, nipiy, eau.
J. Kijemanito, Dieu, kijik, le jour.
K. Kâkike, toujours.
M. Mitoni, bien, kiyâm, c'est égal.
N. Nawatch, plus, yotiu, il vente.
O. Olinew, il le prend, oho, cela.
P. Pâppiw, il rit.
S. Sâwan, vent du sud.
T. Tâpwe, c'est vrai.
U. Comme ou, mustus, bœuf ; prononcez : moustous.
W. Wâyo, loin, wiwa, sa femme.
Y. Yeyew, il respire, wiyâbâmâyek, vu que vous le voyez, nipiy, eau.

Telles sont les lettres usitées, pour écrire les sons de la langue Crise. Quand des mots, qui n'appartiennent pas à cette langue, se rencontrent dans ce livre, alors on les écrit avec les lettres ordinaires, reste aux sauvages de les prononcer à leur façon, v. g. Marie, Mani, François, Pâncois, la farine, napayein.
APPROBATION

Niya, Ketchi ayamihewiyiniwiyâu, ota mesinahikâsuyân, e ijihikâsuyân, e gih wâbatamâu oma nshiyawemasina-higan, mitoni ni tâpwewokeyiten oma ka itasinahikâték. Tasîpwa n'taweyînitakwaw, n't Awâssimisitik, kitchi gaganaawabatamek, kitchi ayamittayek, e ketsinahuyâu kitchi miyoâbatjihikuyek.

† Vital, Evêque de St-Albert,

Alberta, N. W. T.

Patronage de St-Joseph,

1886.
PRIÈRE DE SAINT FRANÇOIS-XAVIER

Manittowil-Kejemanitowiyan, kakiyaw aylisyinlw wejihat, wikiski eyapitch e mitchetitlik nama otayamihawok. Tapwe mistahli klimakikiwok eka tchekwa e kiskeyittaklik klt ijtawawin. Mitchet wanihuwok e ji wayesihlikntlik matchi manitowa. Haw! kejewatilyan Manito, ekawlya wi-ganawabatta opistahuwiniwanwa, maka nawatch wi-kitabatta ki kosia Jesus omikkum kagth metchikawitit e gih wi-kakwatikhestamawit kakiyaw aylisyinlwa, tchi pikkuhat. Wi-klimakinawik aniki eka tchekwa eyamihatlik, pylv kita wi-kakwe-nissitaweyimisklik. Wi-klimakitta milsiwe otchi ka mawlmustokawiyan. Eok'otchi wi-klimakittawinan, niyan e tapwettatak; Espitcho'teniyak ki nantotamatinan kitchi wi-kaskihilitik nama otayamihawok, Jesussa kitchi witjetjilik ota ašlik, ekusi kitchi kljlkok kita wibamatiwik.
OT AYAMIHATIK

Kijemanito, ka tibeyimiwet, ka ojihikoyak; ki ki miyikonow pimâtisiwin, kita otchi kiskeyimâyak, kita sakihâyak, kita atuskawâyak, ekusi ekuta otchi kita wâbamâyak nipiwâyaki. Eoko oma kekwây kitchi osâmi peyaku-âbateyittamak mina kitchi sakamo-otameyittainak, isko pimâtisiyaki.

Oma kitchi kekwây kitchi kaskittamâsuk, n'taweyitchikâtew, kiskeyittamowin, mina mawimustchikewin. Tchikema itastew ayisiyiniw tchi kiskeyimât kijemanitowa mina tchi mâwimustawât, kita wi-nisokkamâkut.

Eoko oma masinahigan ki kiskinohamâkuwaw, kita iji-kiskeyimâyek Kijemanito mina kita iji-mawimustawâyek. Kiskinohamatuwina asitji kak-wetjittuwina ota masinahikatewa, wâwâch nanântôk mawimustchike-ayâmihâwina. Nijweyak
mawimystchikàniniw, emutchipikiskwek, mina e nakumuk, cokotchi ayàmihàwina asitji ayàmilèwinakamuwina masinahikatewa ota. Tàpwé akameyimuk kitchi kiskinohamasuyek ekusi tchi nandottamàwàyek nisokkamàkowisiwin kita ki ijiwebisiyek k’èji n’taweyittamàkoyek.

Ekusi tiyotameku, ki ka miyo ayànàwaw ota askik mina’kitchi kijikòk.

MIYO-NIPUWIN
PRIÈRES

AYAMIHAWINA

Eyigok ka waniskâk, ekusi mina wa kawisimuki,
ekusi kita iji ayamihâniwan.

Au nom du Père,
et du Fils, et du Saint-
Esprit. Ainsi soit-il.

Weyotawimit, mina
Wekosisimit, mina Meyosit Manitô o wiyowi-
nik, Pitane ekusi ikik.

PATERNOSTER.

Notre Père, qui êtes aux cieux.
1. Que votre nom soit sanctifié.
2. Que votre règne arrive.

N'olânân, kitchi-ki-
jikôk eyâyan,
1. Pitane miyweyîljî-
kâtek ki wiyowin.
2. Pitane otchitchipâ-
yik ki tibeyîljîkewin.
3. Ka iji natotâkawiyân kijikôk, pitane ekusi iji waškit askamik.

4. Anotch ka kijikâk, miyhinan nipakwejiganiminân, mina tattwaw kijikâki.

5. Ka iji kâsinamâwakitwaw, ka gih matchitotakoyâkwaw; ekusi wi iji kâsinamawininân ka gih matchi totamâk.

6. Pisiske yimînân kitchi eka matchi mami-toneyitamâk.

7. Iyekatenamawininân ka mayatak.

Pitane ekusi ikik.

3. Que votre volonté soit faite en la terre comme au ciel.

4. Donnez-nous aujourd'hui notre pain quotidien.

5. Et pardonnez-nous nos offenses, comme nous pardonnons à ceux qui nous ont offensés.

6. Et ne nous induisez point en tentation.

7. Mais délivrez-nous du mal.

Ainsi soit-il.

AVE.

Kit atamiskâtin Marie, siyâkaskines kakuyan Manito o sâkîhitowin, ki tehîk ayaw Kije-Manito : eyigok kakkiyaw iskwewok kiya ayiwâk k’iteyitagusin ; ayiwâk mina iteyitagusiw Jesus ka kikiskawat.

Kitcitwaw Marie, Kije-Manito wekâwimisk, a-

Je vous salue, Marie, pleine de grâces : le seigneur est avec vous ; vous êtes bénie entre toutes les femmes, et Jésus, le fruit de vos entrailles, est béni.

Sainte-Marie, Mère de Dieu, priez pour
nous pécheurs, maintenant et à l'heure de notre mort.

Ainsi soit-il.

**Credo.**

1. Je crois en Dieu le Père tout-puissant, Créateur du ciel et de la terre;

2. Et en Jésus-Christ son fils unique notre Seigneur;

3. Qui a été conçu du Saint-Esprit, est né de la vierge Marie;

4. A souffert sous Ponce Pilate, a été crucifié, est mort, a été enseveli;

5. Est descendu aux enfers, le troisième jour est ressuscité des morts;

---

yamihestamawinân piyâstâhuyâk, anotch, mina wi nipiyâki.

Pitane ekusi ikik.

1. Ni tapwewokeyimaw Kijemanito Weyotawimit, kakkiyaw kekwây nettawittât, kijik ka gih ojittât, askiy kiki;

2. Jésus-Christ, Kijemanitowa ka peyakuokosisimikut, katibeyimikoyak;

3. Ka Méyosiyit Manitowa ka gih wiyowihikut; ka kanatâtchâkweyit Mariwa, ka gih nittawikihikut;

4. Gih gwatakihaw megwâtch e kitchi ayiwiyil Ponce Pilata; aymihewatikôk gih tchistahâskwâtaw, gih nipiw; gih nahinaw;

5. Atâmaskamikôk gih nittagusiw; e gih nijo tibiskâyik, gih apisisin.
6. Kijikôk gîh obiskâw, o kitchiniskiyik ciwe, est assis à la nahtapiw olâwiya nû droite de Dieu le Père spitch miyamâtawisiyit.

7. Ekute kila ottuteewi - pe - wiyasuwâlat tatto pemâtisiyit, tatto mina nepiyit.

8. Ni tapwewokeyimaw Meyosit Manito.

9. Ni tapwewokeyiten Katolik ka iji aymihâk, ayamihestamâkewok o Kanatâtchâkwewok;

10. Wi pakitchikâtewa matchi ittiwina;

11. Kita âpisisinâniwiw.

12. Taki kila pimâtisinâniwiw.

Pilane ekusi ikik.

6. Est monté aux ciwe, est assis à la droite de Dieu le Père tout-puissant;

7. D'où il viendra juger les vivants et les morts.

8. Je crois au Saint-Esprit;

9. La Sainte Eglise Catholique; la communion des saints;

10. La rémission des péchés;

11. La résurrection de la chair;

12. La vie éternelle.

Ainsi soit-il.

CONFITEOR.

N'tâtjimisustawaw Kijemanito, nâspitch ka mâmâtâwisit, kitchitwaw Marie ka kanatâtchâkwet, kitchitwaw Michel, ka kitchi okijikowit, kitchitwaw Jean-

Je confesse à Dieu tout-puissant, à la bienheureuse Marie toujours vierge, à Saint Michel archange, à Saint Jean-Baptiste, aux apôtres, Saint Pierre et Saint
Paul, et à tous les Saints (et à vous, mon père) que j'ai grandement péché, en pensée, en parole, et en œuvre :

Par ma faute, par ma faute, par ma très grande faute. C'est pourquoi je prie la bienheureuse Marie, toujours vierge, St-Michel archange, St-Jean-Baptiste, les apôtres, Saint Pierre et St-Paul, et tous les Saints, (et vous, mon père,) de prier pour moi le Seigneur notre Dieu.

Baptiste, kitchitwaw Pierre, kitchitwaw Paul, kakkiyaw mina ka miyo ayâtkik kitchikijikôk, (kiya mina, n'ota,) kitâtjimisustâtin e gih matchi totamân ni mamioneyiljiganik, ni pikiskwewnik, n'titiwiwik :

Niya ka totamân, niya katotamân, niya tibiyaw ka totamân. Eoko tchi'k'o kakisimototawakaw wa ka kanatâtkâkwet Marie, kitchitwaw Michel ka kitchi okijikowit, kitchitwaw Pierre, kitchitwaw Paul, kakkiyaw mina ka miyo ayâtkik kitchikijikôk, kiya mina, n'ota, ki kakisimototâtin, kitchi aymihestamâwiyan Tebeyitjiket ki Kijemanitomînow.

Ni ga wi-kitimâkeyimikonân Kejewâtisit Manitou, mina ni ga wi kâsinamâkonân ka gih matchi totamâk.
DÉCALOGUE

KIJEMANITO OT. ITASIWEWINA.

1. Piyeyakut Kijemanito omanitomih; kitehik otchi mina sakih.
2. Ekawiya wikkâtch wiyakim Kijemanito; ekawiya mina wiya kitamaw ot ojitjigana.
3. Ekawiya ojitjike eyamihewikijikâki; peyat tik ayamiha.
4. Ki nikihi kwok manâtjitotawik, kinowes kitchi pimâtisiyan.
5. Ekawiya nipattâke; ekawiya apow mamitoneyita kitchi nipattakeyan.
6. Ekawiya pisigwâtisi; ekawiya apow pisigwatchimitoneyita.
7. Ekawiya kimotamàw awiyàk ot ayàna; ekawiya mina ganaweyita kekway e gih kimodinàniwik.
8. Ekawiya wikkâtch, kiyàski; ekawiya mina matchiayimom awiyak.
9. Peyakuhituk wiyekituyek; ekawiya pitus awiyak musitawinawik.
10. Ekawiya gagayesinahike.
COMMANDEMENTS DE L'ÉGLISE

AYAMIHEWITASIWEWINA.

1. Manâtjitta kitchi kijikawa.
2. Eyamihewikijikâki wawâch kitchikijikâki, wilji ayamihamâkàn ayamihêwiyiniw Lamesse etweji.
3. Kakkiyaw ki matchi ittiwina atjimustawâk-kàn ayamihêwiyiniw seyâkes peyakwaw tattwaw askiwiki.
4. Tattwaw âpisisino kijikâki ki ka wi kaskit-tamâsun kitchi saskamuhikawiyàn.
5. Tattwaw askiwiki newaw kitchi payiki iyewanisihisukkàn miya nemitanaw kijikaw mayawes espayik Pâk, mina tattwaw wâpaki wi iji kitchi kijikaki, eyigok wittamakâwiyàni.
6. Eyamihêwatîkokijikâki, ekawiya wiyâs mitjikkân.
7. Kîta wi-miyaw ayamihêwiyiniw kitchi otchi pimâtjhut.

GLORIA PATRI.

Pitane mamiteyittagusit Weyotawimit, mina Wekosisimit, mina Meyosit-Manito.
Oskatch ka gih iji mamiteyittagusit, anotch ka iji mamiteyittagusit mina taki, taki. Pitane ekusi ikik.
ACTES

ADORATION

Manatjihatâk Kijemanito.

Kiya ka omanitomimitân, ki peyaku manâtjihitîn; ni kiskeyiten e gih kijihiyân, nâspitch e tibeyimiyan, misiwe kekwây mina e tibeyitaman.

Foi

Tapwettawâtâk Kijemanito.

Ni Manitom, soki nitâpwewokeyitten eyigok ka tapwetakwaw, mina ka kiskinohamâketwaw gwayask ka ayamihâtjik, wetjitawi tiyâpwemâgak kit itwewin.

ESPÉRANCE

Mamisitolawâtâk Kijemanito.

Nâspitch ni mamisin ki kijewâtisiwin, ni Manitom, wi sokiteheskawin ota askîk, kit itasiwe-win kitchi nanagataweyittamân, kijikôk kitchi pittukahiyân.
CHARITÉ

Sâkihatâk Kijêmanito.

Ni Manitom, espitch otehiyân ki sakihilin,
n’itji ayijiyiniwok wawâtch kakkiyaw, espiteyi-
misuyân n’tispiteyimâwok kiya otchi.

CONTRITION

Kakwatakeyimutâk.

Nâspitch’ni kakwatakeyimun, Kijêmanito n’ota,
e gih kichiwahitân kiya e kijewâtesiyan mina e
sâkihigusiyân mamawîyes; iyepine e pakwâtat
awiyak e matchi ijittwât, ni kiskeyiten; kiskisi
maka ki kosis Jesus ka gih iji-kakwatakîtât e wi
kâkitjihisk niya otchi. Namâwiya ayiwâk ki ka
kichiwatin, nisôkamawiyani, ni ka-wi otchi gwâ-
takihisun.

REMERCIEMENT

Nanâskumatâk Kijêmanito.

Osâm e gih miyotôtawiyan, ni Manitom, e gih
ayijiyiniwhiyan, e gih pe itisahamawiyan ki
kosis kitchi pikuhit, ekwa mina e gih iteyimiyan
kitchi witjihîweyân kit ijittwâwinîk, ki nanâsku-
miîn espitch otehiyân.
OFFRANDE

Pakitinamawâtâk Kijemanito ettiyâk.

Ni Manitom, ki pakitinamâtin ni mitoneyitjigân, n’t on, n’t ittiwin, ni pimâtisiwin, misiwe n’t ijiwin, misiwe iji e note-atamihitân.

HUMILITÉ

Piweyimutâk.

Ni Manitom, e kiskeyitamân osâm e pakwâtamân ayiwâkeyimuwin, ki mawimustâtin kitchi iyekatenamawiyân eoko, tânisi kita iji piweyimuyân wi kiskînohamâwin.

DEMANDE

Natotamâketâk.

Kakkiyaw kekwây Nettawittayan, ki natotamâtin kita opimâtjhuyân, eka’ kitchi akusiyân, eka kitchi wayeskânisiyân; maka osâm iyinisiwin ki natotamâtin kitchi nahittâtân, wawâtch kitchi otittamân ka gih kaskittamawit Jesus-Krist. Pitane ekusi ikik.

Kitchitwaw Marie kitchi mawimustât.

Kijemanito wekâwimisk, ki mawimustâtinân kitchi ayamihestamawiyâk; ekawiya sakittowi-
nāh ka iji n'taweyitamātāk, tiyagwatch winisokamāwinān osām e kitimākiśiyāk, wi kaskittamāwinān eka kitchi sākutjihikuyāk matchi ayiwiwin. Pitane ekusi ikik.

Okijiko ka ganaweyimikoyak kitchi mawimustāt.

Wekijikomimitān, kiya ka gih miyikawiyan kitchi ganaweyimiyan, wi witjewin, kakike wi kiskinotahin kitchi miyo tagusiniyān eta ka n'taweyimikawiyān. Pitane ekusi ikik.

Kakike sakihātan nepustamākoyak.
AYAMIHAWINA

AVANT LA CONFESSION

WA-ATJIMISUKI.

Ota k'o pe otjikwanapiyân anotch, ni Manitom, e wi atjimustawak kit ayamihewiyinim tatto ka gih petchi matchitotamân : wi otjikamâwin mitoni kitchi kiskisopayiyân kakkiyaw, gwayask kitchi metchi atotamân espitch otehiyân mina kitchi kesinateyitamân. Pitane ekusi ikik.

APRÈS

Piyoni-âtjimisuki.

Namawiya ekwa ki pakwâsin, ni Manitom, ki mâmâtawihâgan e gih kâsinamâwit, e gih kanât-jittamâwit nit atchâkwa ; kâwi ki miyweyimin, kâwi ki miyweyittamawin tatto ka miyo totasoyân e wi kitimakeyimigowisiyân ; ejî-kitimakisyân megwâtch e kikiskâkuyân matchi ittiwin, namawikkâtch pa gih kisipanopan ni gwâatakittawin atâm askamikôk. Maka ekwa e gih kâsinikâteki ni matchi ittiwina piko kitchi gwatakilhi-
suyàn waskit askamîk megwâtch e ayâyân, ekusi mitoni kitchi ganaweyimisuyàn eka kitwâm kitchi pâstahuyân. Haw! ni Manitom, wi sokiteheskawin, ka iji miyo omitoneyitjiganiyân anotch, isko pimâtisiyâni kitchi iji miyo omitoneyitjiganiyân. Pitane ekusi ikik.

AVANT LA COMMUNION

Wa-saskamuki.

Kejewâtisiyan Jesus, e ata eka mosis wâbamitan, keyiwek ki tâpwewokeyimitin Eukaristiwiñk e ayâyân; kiya'kâ pe-nansiyan siyâskamuhi-kawiyâni, ni ketsinâhun. Tasipwa miyâmaskata-man eji kijewâtisiyan e wi iji miyototawiyân, e ata piweyilagusiyân. Ayiwâk mana e nipewisiyân miyâmmitoneyitamâni ka gih pe ijiwebisiyân. Ki mawimustâtin kejewâtisiyan, kitchi wi miyo-kâsinamawiyan. Nâspitch ki n'taweyimitin n'tehik taki kitchi ayâyân. Pitane ekusi ikik.

APRÈS

Piyoni-saskamuki.

Pâskatch ki gwatate iji nanâskumitin ispitch mamattakuhîyan, e gih wi petchiteheskawiyan anotch, ni Manitom, e ata eka iteyitagusiyân kitchi iji-miyototawiyân. N'âskiganîk kit asiwasun. Haw! mitoni wi-ganaweyimin. Ka iji kisleymikawiyân kijikôk, ekusi nista taki ki wi iji kis-
teyimitin. Namawikkâtch ki ka ki tebinanâskumitin, osâm e atamihiyan. Tebiyâk ekuyigok ni ka kakwe miyo ayiwin nawatch kakiyipa kitchi miyo kaskittamasuyân. Pitane ekusi ikik.

AVANT LES REPAS

Wa-mitjisuki.

Kijemanito n’ota, ni ka wi-miyoskâkun oma anotch ka wi asamiyan. Pitane ekusi ikik.

APRÈS

Piyoni mitjisuki.

Kejewatisiyàn Manito, ki nanâskumitin e gih asamiyan anotch kitchi opimâtjihuyân. Pitane ekusi ikik.
LA SAINTE MESSE

LAMESSE ET WEKI
KITCHI MIYOWITJIHIWEK
AYAMIHAWINA

COMMENCEMENT
Kelchi ilweki Lamesse.

E ata piweyitagusiyân, ni Manitom, keyiwek ota ni pe pitukân e wi wâbatehitân espiteyimitân. E kiskeyitamân osâm e 'atamihiwakiyan wiyebinâsustakawiyani, ni tehik tebiyâk otchi ni wi witjihiwân oma anotch ka wi iji webinasustaka-
wiyan. Tanisi ni ka gih omitoneyitjigani gih wâbamak megwâtch e âkwamut ayamihewâtikôk, Ana ka gih wi nipustamakoyâk; ekusi ni ka wi iji omitoneyitjiganin anotch. Wi kitimakeyimin, ni kitimâkisin.

CONFITEOR

Iyâtjimisuki.

Ki kiskeyimin, ni Manitom, eji kitimâkisiyân, eji matchi ayiwiyân; osâm mitchetwaw e petjikichiwahitân. Ni pastahikun ni mitoneyitjigan, ni pastahikun n't'on, ni pastahikun n't'ittiwin,
niya e totamân, niya c totamân, niya tapwe e totamân. Ki pettawin eji piweyimisuyân; wi kitimakittawin, wi kâsinamawin: Okanatâchâk-wewok ni mawimustawawok kakkiyaw kita wi ayamihestamâwitjik.

Kirie eleison etweki.

Nit atchâkunanak wejihatwaw, kitimakeyimik kit ojitjiganak; Weyotawimikawiyân, ki kijewâtisin, wi saweyimik kit awâssimisak.

Kiya ka gih kaskittamawiyâk pimâtisiwin e gih nipustamawiyâk, wi hisokamawinân kitchi nangataweyitamâk ka gih iji miyokaskittamawiyâk.
Kejewâtisiyan Jesus, ekawiya ataweyiminân e ata piweyitâgusiyâk; tiyakwatches kâsinamâwinân ni matchi ittiwininana.

GLORIA IN EXCEESIS

Okijiko wi-nakamuwin eyamitâki.

Kita wi, kisteyimaw kijikôk eyât Kijemanito; kita wi mamâtagusiwok waskit askamik ka miyo-tehetjik ayijîyiniwok. Namawiya eka taki kita mamitjimitân, Wekijemanitomimitân: nâspitch ki kisteyimitin; espitch otehiyân mina ki nanâskumilin e gih kitimâkeyimiyan, Piyeyakomañitowiyan, memâtlawisiyan, Weyotawimikawiyan.
Menitowiyan Jesus, Piyeyako okosissimisk Tebeyitjiket; kakkiyaw kekway tebeyitaman, matchi ittiwinà kitchi pe kàsinamawiyàk, ki ki iji pe-itisahukawittay: haw! wi pikuhinàn, kiya piko nama kekwày ki pwàtawìtàn; kiya piko ki pa gih kaskihinàn osàm è màmàltawisiyan.

Dominus vobiscum.

Eyamihestamàgeki.

Ka natotamàskik Okanàtchàkwewòk e itwes-tamakoyàkwaw, wi miyhik; ka iji n'taweyitamàsk mina kit atuskeyàgan anotch, e'itwestama-koyàk, wi tàpwettaw. Oma nista ka witjihi-
weyâⁿ, ni wi ayamihestamowâwok n't otemak, nitji ayijiyiniwok wâwâtch kakkiyaw; soki ki natotamâtin, Tebeyimiywâk, nete kitchi miyowabamitâk.

L'Epitre eyamiltâki.

Ni Kijemanitom, ki gih kiskeyittamohin kit itasiwewin, e gih etchikâ ani ayiwâkeyimiyân niya, eyigok ole kutagak ka osâm ayititjik eka iskwa e kiskeyimiskwaw. Espitch otehiyân ni wi nanagataweyîten ki pekiskwewin e tâpwewokeyitâmân. E ikik mana, niyâk ka gih kiskeyitamo-hiweyan e wi ikik, ayiwâk ni mamattagusin:
k'ejî; sâkihiskwâw Okanâtâtchâkwewok, pitane nista ekusi iji sâkihitân: ka gih iji n'daweyimi-kawiyan kayâs, ekusi kit iji n'daweyimitin anotch. Wi kitimâkittawin.

L'Evangile eyamittâki.

Kejewâtisiyan Jesus, kiya tibiyaw ki pekisk-wewin ka miegwa ayamittât ayamihewiyiniw, tâsipwa nepâwiyân kita kiskeyîmikawiyân eji râpwewokeytamân. N'iskatikôk n't ayamihewâtikonamâsun eka wikkâtch kitchi nipewisistamân ki kakeškikemowin otchi; n'tonik, kitchi mami-tjittamân ayamihâwin; n'tehîk - kâkike kitchi
'sâkittayân, kitchi ganaweyitamân wâwâch. K'êji n'daweyimiyan kitchi ittiyân, ni wi ittin : maka ayiwâk ni wi sâkujihikun matchi ayiwiwin : wi nisokamawin, wi sokiteheskawin kitchi sâkujittayân. Pitane ekusi ikik.

Credo eyamittâki.

Tâpwewokeyitamowin.

Ni tâpwewokeyimaw Piyeyakumanitowit. We-yotâwimit, nâspitch ka mâmâtâwisit, kijik, askîy mina ka gih ojittât, wâwâch kakkiyaw kekwây niyogwaki, eka niyogwaki mina.

Nilapwewokeyimaw Jesus-Krist, Tebe'yimiko-
yak, e peyaku-okosisimikut Kije-Manitowa; k'ei Manitowi'yit, k'ei mâmättawisiyit wâwâtch, wekosisinikut, ekusi wista eji manitowit, eji mâmättawisi't-mina. Taki gih ittaw, namawik-kâtch kita pont ittaw; gih pe ayijiyiniwihisuw, wiya tibiyaw e wi kiskinohamowât ayijiyiniwa; gih nipustanawew ekusi e wi iji kaskittamowât pimâtisiwin; gih âpisisin'; kijikôk gih obiskaw. Ekute otchi kita pewiyasuwtew ayijiyiniwa.

Ni tâpwewokeyimaw Meyosjt Manitow ka pimât-jihiwet, ka iyinisihiwet, ka Kijemanitowit k'ei Manitowi'yit Weyotawimimit, Wekosisimit mina.

Ni tâpwewokeyiten ka peyakumiywâsik ayami-hewijittwâwin Katolik ka iji-ikâtek: matchi itti-wina wi kâsinikatewa; wi âpisisinaniwiw, taki wi pimâtisinaniwiw. Pitane ekusi ikik.
Offertoire

Pakitinamâgewin.

Weyotawimimikuwiyan Manitô, osâm ni piwe-yitâgusin niya, kitchi pakitinamâtân anotch ka pakitinamâkawiyan; maka meskutch ni teh, ni yaw, nit atchâk, ki pakitinamâtin : wi peyakutibeyimin.
LAVABO

Kâsitchitchevin.

Tebeyimiyâk, wi kanâljittamâwin nit atchâk, wi kitimûkeyittamâwin, eka wikkâtch kitchi iyepâtjihikut matchi ittiwin.

Weyotawimimitân Manito, nâspitch ni pagusittân kitchitwaw webinâsûwin ka megwa pakitina-mâkawiyân, kitchi miyo-abatjihikuyân, tattô mina ka gwayask ayamihâtjik, kitchi miyo-abatjihikutwaw.
PRÉFACE

Mamitjimiwewin.

Miyamâtlâwisiyan Manito, kijikôk ki mamitjimikwok Okanâtâchâkwewok wâwâtch kakkiyaw; pâskatch namawikkâtch tebakeyimuwok espitch mâmattaguhatwaw. Niya wiya, e ata piweyitagusiyân, keyiwek, tanisi etiskwaw memitjimiskwâwi, nista ekusi ki wi ilitinî.
Sanctus.

Kitchitway! Kitchitwaw! Kitchitwaw! mâmas-kateyitagusiw kijikôk, mamaskâteyitagusiw was-kit askamik, Tebeyimikoyak Manito. Okijikowa mâmitjimik; Ayijiyiniwa mawimustâk.

Siyewipitjikeki.

Kijamanito, Weyotawimimitâk., wi saweyimik ayamihewiyiniwok, nit otemak, tatto mina ka miyweyimitjik, tatto mina ka pakwâsitjik; wi kitîmakeyimik kakkiyaw.
CONSECRATION

Meskutchimuttâgewin.

Iskwayâtch Jesus ka gih witospamât o witjiwâgaña, e gih otinât pakwejigana, gih nanâskumuuw; ekusi e gih mâtinamowât o witospamagana, omisi itew: "Otinik, Mowik Etasiyek, Eoko Oma Ni-Yaw."

Ekwa mina sominâpwîy e gih otinak kitchiwa minikwâtjiganik e asiwateyik, nanaskumuuw ekusi e itisinahamowât o witospamagana, mina itew: "Otinamuk, Minikwek Etasiyek, Eoko Oma Ni Mik."
ÉLÉVATION

Oppinigewin.

Kejewâtisiyan Jesus, kiya tibivaw eji Manitowiyan, eji ayijiyiniwiyan mina, ka megwa opinikawiyan; ki nawokislâtin e manatjihilân. Ekwa tapwe niyokuttamawiyan espiteyimiyan, e pe webinisuyan ota, niya otchi.

Eoko anima ki mik ka, asiwatek kitchitwaw minikwâtjîganik; ka megwa oppinamik; ni nawokisten e manitokataman; eoko ka gih meschika-
wittâyan niya otchi: namawikkâtch ni ka wani-
kiskisin ki kijewatisiwin.

Ni Manitom Jesus, webinasuwinâtikôk eyâyan
megwâtch, ki nanaskumîtin ispîch otehiyân osâm
e gih kitimakeyimiyan. Namawikkâtch ni ka
wanikiskisin ayamihewatikôk e.gih nipustamawi-
yan; ki mik e gih mestchikawittayan, e wi kas-
kittamâwiyan nit atchâk eka kita matsustewebinit.
Ni mamaskâten eji kijewâtisiyan, osâm misiwe
iji e wi miyototawiyân, e ata matchi ayiwiyân.
Nâspitch ni kesinâteyîten tanisi e gih petji matchi
ijiwebisiyân: wi sokiteheskawin eka wikkâtch
kitchi matchitotamân.

Okâsinamâkewiskutek ka megwa gwatakittâjik,
wi pikuhik, ekwa miyawâtikwanôk wi pitukah-
hik; niya mina niyânk ki natotamâtin ki gîk
kitchi pitukahiyan ela eyâtjik siyâkihiskwaw. Pi-
tane ekusi ikik.

PATER

N'otânân eyamittâki.

Ayiwâk ni kitimakeyimigowisin, n't eyiten, e
otawâsimisimimiyan, ni Manitom, eta eyâyan ki
gîk kitchi ayayân e iteyimiyan; miyâmitoneyitâ-
mâni mana, ayiwâk ni miyweyîten. Misiwe ki
ka wi-kiskeyimikawim, misiwe ki ka wi manâtji-
hikawin. Ni teh wi peyaku-tibeyitta. Ekawiya sa-
kittowin kita opimatjibuyân. Metchitotakawiyâ-
ni ispîch otehiyân ni pakiteyîten mana, ekusi
wi-ijt-pakiteyitamâwin metchitotamâni; wi soki-
teheskawin eka kita sakutjihikuyan matchi mitonevitchigan. Wi iyekatenamawin matchi ittiwin; eoko osâm e kitimahiwemagak. Pitane ekusi ikik.

COMMUNION

Eyamihewi Saskamuki.

Kiyanishamowatwaw ayijiyiniwok o matchi ittiwiniwawa, wi kitimakeyimin taki kitchi nahittatâk, ki n’daweyitamatinân.

Ekuyigok meyo ayiwiyan kitchi witjiwakwaw
ka osāmimiyo ayiwitjik tattwaw kijikāyiki e kas-
kittamasutwaw kitchi saskamuhitjik, ayiwāk ni
pa̱miyweyiten; maka osām ni piweyillāgusin
ekusi kitchi iji miyokaskittamasuyān. Kejewati-
siyan Jesus, kakkiyaw kekwily keskeyitaman; ki

kiskeyimin nista nāspitch e n’daweyimitān anotch
kitchi petjiteheskawivan: wi kāsinamāwin ni
matchi ittiwina; wi kanatātchukwehin. Ni gas-
keyiten nista e wi saskamuhigusiyān: ki tāpwe-
wokeyimitin Eukaristiwinik; ki pagusihitin is-
pitch otehiyān, ki wi sākihitin laki. Pitane ekusi
ikik.
Keji itweki Lamesse.

Kije-manito Weyotawimimitâk, ki nanâskumitîn, osâm e gih miyo totâwiyan, e ata êkâ iteyi-tâgusiyân kitchi iji miyoganawabamiyan. Nas-pitch ni miyweyiten e witjihîweyân wiyebinâsus-takawiyani. Kispin tanisi naspâtch n'toten anotch ota ka witjihîweyân, ki mawimustatin kitchi wi-kâsiuamawiyân. Tattwaw witjihîweyâni ni ga wi miyo-ayamîhân, wi sokiteheakawin eka kitchi sakujîlhikuyân naspâtch mitoneyitjîgan. Pitane ekusi ikik.

Pesikwatisiyek, eka wikatch ka nepewisiyek, wabamik ki Manitomiwaw, ejinagusit, kiyawaw, ka totawayek. Ekawiya anwettak e n'taweyimikoyek kitchi meskutch ijiwebisiyek.

Ni miyo Jesus, kiya piko otchi kotchipayik kanatatchakwewin, miyin tchi kiyamewisiyan; kita kustaman pisikwatisiwin.

Eka tcheskwa e ki pakiteyimit Jesus kitchi nipahit sisily n'tâweyimaw kita tchistahaskwâtit. Ekwa tapwe ekusi totawaw. Pemâtjihiwet nipahik anihii ayisiyiniwa, ka winipustamawat. Sekke pakitinisuw. Tatâstâweyâkaskitchichânestawaw, mina tatâstâweyâkaskîstenestawaw nisi sakahigana otchi. Pakamâhiskwâtamwân, wawâtch tchimayaw, ekusi e wi-kâkitchjhât anibi weyottawimât Manitowa.

Pâstâhuwin k'otchi nipahit ni Miyo Jesus. Matchi pâstâhuwin, osâm mitchetwaw ki sakotchihiwân. Mitchet olayamihâwok paskiyâwewok Judawiyiniwa, eji matchi pimatîsitjik.

Misîwe iji mâmaskâtch itâbamonâniwiw. E wi-poni-pimâtisit Jesus, mistahi tepwew: "Kakiyaw kekwây kijitjikâtew," e itwet, ekusi e ki nawoskweyit, iskwatâmow.

DEVANT L'AUTEL.

Ni Miyo Jesus, ki nanâskumitin, anotch ka ki miyokiskinohamâwiyan. Ni nepewis'n miyâmitoneyittamâni ka ki iji-kitimahitân. Osâm tâpwe ki ki sakihin ekusi e wi-kakwatakihestamâwiyan. Ni wi-pakwâten ekwa ni matchi ittiwina. Wi-ganâweyimin. eka kita misiwanâtjihisuyân kittwâm, piwis tchi kaskihuyân kita wâbamitân kitchi kijikok.

Pitane ekusi ikik.
PRIÈRE DU MATIN

KIKIJEBKA KA AYAMIHAK

OTA ITATEYIMATAK KIJEMANITO, MANATJIHATAN.

Nâspitch ketchitwâwisiyân, piyeyaku kijemanitowiyan, e ata nistweyakihuyan, anotch kikijeb ki pe-mawimustâtin, weyotâwimitân. E ata piweyittâgusiyân, eyiwek ki wi-wâbatehitin eji manâljihitân.

Nanâskumatak Kijemanito kakiyaw kekwây ka miyo totâkoyak.

Ni Manitom, mitoni ki nanâskumitîn kakiyaw kekwây ka miyo totawiyan anotch isko. N’taka e kitimâkeyimiyan eyâbitch k’o wâbatamân anotch
ka kijikâk. Pitane misakâme alamihitân. Ekusi iji wi-nisokkamâwin. Ki miyitîn kisâtch ni mitoneyitchigan, ni pikiskwewîna, ni totamowîna mina n’tayimisiwîna, misiwe ni pimâtisiwin. Wisaweyitta eoko kakiyaw, eka kekwây naspâtch kita totamân anotch. Pitane maka eji pimâtisiyân k’eji n’taweyittamâwiyan.

Pitane ekusi ikik.

Kakwe tebeysmotân eka kittwâm kita matchi ni iylyak.

Siyâkihigusiyân Jesus, kiya, ka ki pe-kiskinohamâwiyâk miyo pimâtisiwin, ni ga kakwe toten kita naspitatân. Pitane eka kittwâm kisiwahitân ni matchi pimâtisiwin otchi, eji mustawinamân tchi atamihitân.

Mawimustawatâk’Kijmanito kita nisokkamâkoyak.

Ni Manitom, ki kiskeyitten eji-nisowisiyân mana. Nama nando ni ga ki abatjihisun eka miyiyan ki nisokkamâkewîn. Ekawiya wi-sâkitlowin eji-gwitamâyiyan. Eoko wi-sokkastwâhin kitchi nitta-tabasittayân ka iji-kitahamâwîvan kekwây; wawâtch kita totamân tânisi ka iji-n’taweyittamâwiyan.

N’otâwinân, etc….. Kit atamiskâtîn, Marie, etc…..
Ni tapwewokeyimaw, etc…..
Kitchitwa Marie mamisitotawatan.

Kitchitwa Marie, Kijemanito wekâwimisk, minaniya wekâwimitân, ki mamisitotâtîn, tchi aya-mihestamâwiyan. Wi-kitimâkittawin anotch ka kijikâk, kwayask kita pimâtisiyan, kitchi nanahiltawok ki kosis Jesus, 'isko pimâtisiyâni, mina nagatamâni ota askik, kita wâbamak kijikok.

PRIÈRE DU SOIR

WETAGUSIKI EYAMIHAKI.

Ota Hâteyimâtâk Kijemânto, manltoweylmâtân

Ni manîtom, anotch ka-tibiskâk, ki pe-otchikwanapistâtin, espiteyimitân eji-peyaku-kijemai nitowiyaa. Ki lâpwettâtin taki liyâpweyan; k, mamisitotâtin eji-kijewâtisiyan; espitchotehiyânki sâkihitin, iyepine siyâkihigusiyan, mina eji sâkihisuyân, n’tijisâkihaw n’it’jayisiyiniw, kiya otchi.

Nanâskumîtân Kijemânto, ka’klyaw kekwây ka pe-miyototâkoyak.

Ni manîtom, tânisi ki pa eji-tebi-nanâskumitîn wikkâich, kakiyaw kekwây ka miyo totawiyan, aspin k’otchiyân? ki ki ayisiyiniwihiin; ki ki miyin kit ayamihâwin; ki ki mekin ki pimâtsiwin ayamihewâtlikok e nipustamâwiyan kitehi pimâtjihiyan; mina tattwaw kijikâki eyâbitch ki gwitate eji miyo totawin, e âta anwetta-
tân. Tânisi kita totamân ekuyigok kitchi nanâskumîtân ki kijewâtisiwina otchi? Kiyawaw, sâsây k'otaskiyek kijikok, wi-nisokkamâwik, manâwi kitchi mâmîjimâyak eji-kijewâtisit Manitô. Pitane ekusi ikik.

Nandotamâwâtâk Kijemanîto kitalkiskeyittamohkoyak kl matchî lttlwîlnlnowa.

Meyo manitowîyan, kiya, kakiyaw kekwây keskeyittaman, wi-kiskeyittamohin kakiyaw ni pâstâhuwina. Wi-maskawisihin kita pakwâtamân matchî pimâtisiwin mina mistahi kita kustamân kittwâm tchi kisiwahîtân. Tânisi ka ki iji naspâtch totamân, wi kiskisohin.

Nanagatawey imîsûtân kl matchî lttlwîlnnowa kîta kîsîlyak, matchî mitoneyltchîgan otehl, matchî piklakwewîn otehl, matchî totamowîn otehl

Tebeyitchikeyan, mistahi ni nepewokeyimon nabetch ekwa e iji-matchî ayiwiyân. Ata ekwa mitoni ni mitâten ka iji anwettâtân, kiya ka iji sokhihiyan' mina eji-kijewâtisiyan, pâskatch e ki nipustamâwiyan. Ekusi etchikâni kit iji-tipahamâtîn ka miyo totawîyan? Eji-kesinâteyimisuîyân, e kisiwahîtân, sokki pitus ni wi-iijiwebisin.

Pitane eka wikkâtch ki kisiwahîtân, ni Manitom, notch maka ni webinen ni matchî pimâtisiwin, mina nisokkamâwiyanî, nama kittwâm ki ka kakwe kisiwahîtin isko pimâtisiyâni. Pitane ekusi ikik.
Nándotamawatâk Kijemanito kita miyo nipawâyak

Ni manitom, wi-saweyitta ni nipâwin, kita miyo nipâyân, eka kita matchi pawâtamân, wâbaki tchi miyo waniskâyân, ayiwâkês katawa kita atuskâtân. Eokotchî ki miyîlin misiwe ni pimâtisiwin, n’iyaw, n’tatchâk, kitchi ganâweyimiyan anotch ka tibiskâk mina isko pimâtisiyâni.

Ayamihestamâketâk.

Tebeyimiweyan, wi-miyo-kitimâkeyim ni kitchi ayamihewiyinim, mina wi-ganâweyimik ayamihewiyiniwok ota mana ka kiskinohâmâwitwaw; wâwâch wi-miyoganâwâbamik n’t’otemak kakiyaw; mina kakiyaw ayisiyiniwok eyamihâjik n’t’ayamihestamâwâwok; mina iyiniwok ekatcheskwâ e kiskeyittakwaw kit ayamihâwin, kita wi-ayamihâwok. Tatto kâssinamâkewiskutek eyâtjik, n’t’itwestamâwâwok pitane kiyipa kisi-kâssinamâsutwaw.

PRIÈRE POUR UNE BONNE MORT

KITCHI MIYO-NAGATASKEYAK.

Ni Manitom, ni kiskeyilten kita nipiyân nângutita, maka namawiya ni kwayaskweyitten tâneyigok mwelchi ke poni-yeyeyân. Eokotchi mistahi n’t’astâsin kitchi nandomiyan ketattawe eka asweyittamâni. Appo anotch ka t’biskâk namawiya ni ketchinâhun kittwâm kita waniskâyân. Pitane eka wikkâtch kikiskâkuyân matchi pastâhuwin, eka kita matchi nipiyân. Kiyâm, ni Ma-
nitom, piko eyigok iteyittamani, ki ka otinen ni pimâtisiwin. Ki tchitchik ni pakitinaw nî'tatchâk, oma ka wi-nipâyân, mina-wi-nipiyâni, wi-otinikkan, kejewâtisîyan-Jesus. Kiya miûa, Marie Nega, kit awâssîinis; wi-ganâweyîm anotch, mina kâkike ota askik.
