4me INSTRUCTION.

DES SACREMENTS.

(Ayamihewinanatàwihuwina)

De plenitudine ejus, nos omnes accepimus et gratiam pro gratia.

(S. Jean, 1.)

Ot ayiwakeyitdkusiwinik otchi kakiyow ki ki otchitamakawinonow eweyotchipayitivàkowisiyak, saweytimikowiwin.

Nì'aw ssimissilik, anotch n'tatamioàn è otchitchipayìhkuyàn, kitchi ayimotamàtakwaw ekwa ayamihewinanatàwihuwina. Ayis, eoko peyak kekwày mistahi ka ayiwakeyitchkàtek catholic ayamihewijìtwàwinik, kita kwayaskweyìltamik
espayiki mana ayamihewinanatâwihuwina. Ot ayamihâw ayisiyiniw, sâsây ka ki totchikâsut âtit otchi ayamihewinanatâwihuwina, kiya miweyittam kâkittwâm e miskawâsomit, tânisi espitêyiîtâkwaniyik o totchikâsuwin. Eokolchi ekwa ki wi otchîstamâtînâwaw ayamihe-kakesikkemowin; espayiki ayamihewinanatâwihuwina. Weskatch mayowes ayamihâk waskitaskamik, eyiwek ki illâkunwa, totchikâsowinikkâna, e itâbatâkwaw ayisiyiniwok-tchi peyakweyitultwaw, ejî mumâweyitultwaw kekwanok manilo-mawimus-tchikelwâwi. Kayâsijîttwâwinik ki totâkaniwibani initchet nanâtâwihuwinikkâna, tchi kassiyâbawayehisuk, maka eoko kayâs ijîttwâwin Judawiyinivok ot ojîttwâwiniwaw ka îtamik, namawiya tâpwe ki âwanobân, piko tâbiskoteh niyâk e kiskinohamomagak, anotch ekwa ijîttwâwin ka ki tabapistâkumagak. Eokoni kayâs nanâtâwihuwinikkâna tâbiskotch' e tchikâstettikî, eyigok e tâpwemagakwa anotch iyenaço ayamihewinanatâwihuwina, eokoni piko e ikkiki kitchi tâpwe totchikâsuk ayamihâwinik jji.

Nanâtâwihuwina ijihikâlewa, e onanâtâwat-châkwewinik. K'ejî nanâtâwihuk mana wewiyâwik eyâkkusiki, ekusi mina wâwis tchi nanâtâwihuk wetatchâkuk, piyâstâhuki, k'ejî âkkusik miyâwik, ekusi mina iji ayaw atchâk, e âkkû-
siskâkot matchi ittiwin. K’eji ittakuki mana mas-
kikiya, pâpitus etakîchikâteki kitchi nanâtâwi-
wâkek, nando etâmatjihuki, ekusi mwetchi itta-
kunwa manitowimaskikiya, kita nanâtâwatchâk-
wek, e ânisîchiganiwik, eyâkkusiskâkemagaki
pâstahuwina.

A yamihewinanâtâwihuwin, k’etamik, eoko ani-
ma: eka niyokwak otchistamâkowisiwin o kiskino-
wâteyîchîgan niyokwak ka ki ijîtât J.-C., kita
-itchitwâwisihât kit atchâkonowa. Kukwe-kwayâs-
kweyittamuk k’etweyân, omisi: lo Ayamihewi-
nanâtâwihuwin, eoko mina, eka niyokwok otchis-
tamâkowisiwin o kiskinowâteyîchîgan niyokwak,
îtwâniw, tchikema, ayamihewinanâtâwihuwin,
ekuta k’o ittakuk ke nokwak kekwây otchi, e wâ-
battamik appo e pettamik, appo e kiskeyittamik
nando iji. Semâk kiskeyittâkwan: itchist ayami-
hewiskâhatchikâsuwinik; nipiy ka îtabatak
mana miyaw tchi kâssiyâbawâtâk, ekwa awâsis
ostikwânik e sîkinamuth, nokullâniwiw kiskino-
wâteyîchîgan, e kiskeyittâkusit ka sikâhatchikâ-
sut, tchi otchistamâkowisit, ot atchâkwa e kâssi-
hamâkowisiyit pâstâbuwin ka pe kiki nittâwikit.
Kitchitwâsokkitêheskâketominîtuwinik, — anima
kitchitwa pimiy ot awiwiniw kitchi ayamihewi-
yîniw tchi tomiskattikwenât ayisiyîniwa, eoko
kiskinowâteyîchîganîwiw, e aveyittamik k’eji
otchistamakowisitânâh ka kitchi tochikusût Mina,
eyâbîch ekusi ayamihewikassihamâkewinik:
ayisiyiniw ka âjîmisustâwât ayamihewiyiniwa e,
kassihamâkut, eoko kiskinowâteyitchikâteyu tchi
âweyittamuth kisik e kassihamâkut Kijemanitowâ.
Ekusi ati kutakâ ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina,
kitchi ki itâstûk. 2o Ekwa ekusi itwâniwan:
ka ki ojitât J.-C. Tchikema J.-C., ânah ka ki
pe ayisiyiniwibisût, tchi ayisiyiniwimaniwit, wiya
piko ka ki ojitât ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina,
missawâtch wiya piko tchi kâskittât. Awena
makâ pitus, eka ki Kijemanitowit, kita ki awet-
âw uando kiskinowâtjihikâsuwin, kita otchista-
mâkowisût? Namawiya esâni ayamihewiyiniwok,
ka ki ojitâlik ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina, piko
ki pukitinamâkwok Jesusa, e kanawiskottahî,
kuttuw, tchi totamâketwâwâ. Eokotchi Trentâ
otchi ayamihewikitchimâwâtjihituwin omisi ki
pakitchimiwâniwiw e ki itwemagak: "Kispia
"awiyak itwetji ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina, eka
"kakiyaw e ki ojitâyit Jesusa, kita webinikowi-
siw. (Sess. 7. Canon 1-3.) 3o Ekwa wâwâtch
ekusi itwâniwan: Kittu kitchitwâwisihât kit. atâhâ-
konowa. Atâ J.-C. o nipustamâkewin oôhi, e ku
tebi-kâskittamâkoyuk kitchi pikkohûwayak, eyîn
wêk ki pukitinam ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina
kitchi otâbaljîjigâniwit, k'otchi otchistamâkoyak;
o miyo kaskittanakewina. Ayamibewinanatawihawinak ki ojitjikatewa, kitelki ki chitwawisihikuyak, "e miyikuyak miyowatisiwak, mina e yakkimotiwakuyak, oppo weniltiyaki, lewi e mekinawatikoryak." (Como. Trad., khid.) Tepakop itatiqwa: ayamibewinanatawihawinak namawiya ayiwak mina namowiya astameyigok. Eokomi: Ayamibewisikabatchikasuwini, Kitelkwawisokkiteheskilkeleminituwin, Ayamibewiskissihomakewini, Kitchawa Eucharistiwin, Iskweyatch ayamibewilominituwin, Ayamibewiyiniwijihitwini, Ayamibewikitchiwikittuwini.

Tebeyimitak ki tepi kupitilaw ayamibewinanatawihawinak ketafiniyik, ot ayamibewina ot itatisiwiniyiya. Ayamibewisikabatchikasuwini nekanirwak, kittwini ki niduwikiwatchakwebikurow. Kitelkwawisokkiteheskilketominituwin, ki yakkimohikurow miyowatchakwewink, wawitch kit ayamaskibikurow ayamibewitapewewokeyita- mowinik. Kitchawa Eucharistiwin otchi asamikwisiw kihi atchikonow. Ayamibewiskissihomakewini ki nanahwatchawehikurow, e spasissihikuyak pistahuwink otchi. Iskweyatch ayamibewilominituwin ki sokkiketeshikikurow cyakkusiyaki, eka kilak leustamak nipuwini. Ayamibewiyiniwijihitwiniak otchi etinikasuwok ayamibewiyiniwok kiha pamititarjik Ayamiha win, mina kit-
chi pamistâketjik. Ayamihewikitchiwikittluwinik otchi kitchi mitchetohitutjik ot ayamihawok. Ekuta otchi anotch k'etwâtamân ayamihewina nâtâwihuwina, kita kirk'yîllâkâniwiw, k'eji kwitamâk k'kwâya kitchi pimâtjiyâwek, ekusi mina kitchi pimâtatchâkwek: kitchi nîtâwikik, tchi yakkikik, tchi sokkikik, kitchi mitjîsuk, kitchi nanâtâwihuk eyâkkusiki, âlit ayisiyinîwok tchi oyâsuweljik mina tchi pamistâketwaw mina kitchi nîtâwikibituk, eka kita metchi poni-ayisiyiniwiw.

Eyiwek mistahi âbataniyu ot ayamihaw kitchi kweyaskweyîttâk kakiyaw ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina espayiyik, ata kakiyaw eka. kitchi ki otchi totchikâsul, osâm maka âtit.

Nijweyakittînwa ayamihewinanâtâwihuwina, nijo kekwaya oti e n'tâweyitchikâtekwaw ayamihewinanâtâwihuwininik, ot awiwinîwin, mino opikiskwewiniwin, k'o itwët kitchitwa Augustin: "O pikiskwewiniwin welittamomagaki ot awiwinîwin, ekuta k'otchipayik ayamihewinanâtâwihuwin." Ot awiwinîwin k'ejhikâtek, eoko anima kekwây k'otawiwinik ketchitotâkâki, tabiskotch nipîy, kitchilwapimîy.... matchi iltiwina e atotchikâtekwaw. Opikiskwewiniwin maka, eokoni pikiskwewina kaâbatjîttâk, ispi wakitchitotâkeki. Ekuta ketchina k'otchipayik
ayamihewitotchikasuwin, e ayamihewipikiskwek otchi. Tchikema ata awiyak sakinamutji nipiy ostikwanik, namawatcho pa ayamihewisikahatchikasuw, kispin e ka itwewitji: "Kit ayamihewisikahattatin Weyottawimit, etc., etc.

Kakiyaw ayamihewinanatawihuwina namawiya peyakwan ispityittakwanwa. Atit mami tchetwaw kita ki totchikasunaniwan. Alit maka papeyakwaw piko. Eokoni anihi mami tchetwaw ka miyituk: Ayamihewikassihaminakewin, kit chitwa Eucharistiwin, Iskweyatch ayamihewitominituwin, mina ayamihewikitchiwikittuwin. Papeyakwaw maka ka otilikuk, eokoni: Ayamihewisikahatchikasuwin, Kitchitwasokkiteheskaketominituwin, mina Ayamihewiyiniwijihituwin. Eokoni nisto papeyakwaw piko, k'o totchikasuk, tchikema k'oji naspitchi kiskinowatchakwehikowisik eka wikkatch tchi kassipayik, e ata pastahuki, mistahi matchi totamiki, appo webinamiki ayamihawin. Awiyak ka iji-kiskinowatchakwehikowisit nikotowa anihi nisto ayamihewinanatawihuwina nama wikkatch kita poni kikiskakuw otaaskik, mina awasite kutak pimatisiwinik. Meyo-ayiwitji, kita matnattakobikuw kitchi kijikok, metchi ayiwitji maka kita nipahinepewihikuw kitcki iskutek. Tchist awah ayisiyiniw siyekahatchikasut, wanihukwe, kita pimi-
tisahokow o sikahalechikasuwin, misiwe e kiske-
yittakusit e ki misiwandjifit, tabiskotch awiyak
ka wiyattalbic kanajimiyomiskwakly, ekusi ku
n'tawiwiyepiskak.

Akameyimek, a'kawassimissitik, kakiyipa
kita kakwekaskittamasuyek ayamihewinanat-
wihowina, keji iteyitlakusiyek. Talwaw eya-
mihewAtjimisuyeke, mina talwaw eyamihew-
saskamoyeku, takki ayiwakes kakweniyopim-
tisik, kakwe Atchiwinaok ki matebi ittiwiniwew-
wa. Pitane'tapwe miyekakukuyek, talwaw edaky
ka kitichitokawiyek, eka kitkwam kita olitri-
kuyek matchi Akkusiskakewi pastahowina!

Nijweyakanwa ayamihewinanatwihowina:
Atit kesinateyimisu - ayamihewinanatwihowina,
ekusi kutaka "Pimatlji-ayamihewinanatwihowina,"
jilbikqteewa: Kesinateyimisu-ayamihewi-
nanatwihowina, eokoni: k'otchi kassibamaskok
matebi igirwina, kispin mitoni kesinateyimisu-
ki. Nijowanwa, ayamihewisikahatchikasuwin, mina
ayamihewi-kassibamakewin. Pimatlji-ayamihewi-
nanatwihowina, eokoni; eka kitchi ki tota-
milk, piko pilu kitchi kassibamaskok ejii-matebi
totumik. Tchikemak kispin awiyak n'tawi-kitchi-
totchikuyujji atu kiokeyittak eka e kanajitcha-
kwet, misthi-pu pastahuw e metawaket ketchi-
lwaniyik kekwily.
Etatiki ayamihewinanatawihuwina, kitchitwa Eucharistiwin, eoko anima mamawiyes ka ayi-wakeyitlakwak, ka kisleeyitlakwak, mina ka kitchitwaweyitlakwak, ichikema ekotowik e ayat espitisiit J.-C., eji Kijemanitowit mina ejia-yisisiwiwit, e kasnalaket manito-pakkweinganik.

Ayamihewinanatawihuwiza namaawiya kakiyaw payakwan etabatanwa kitchi pikkobuk. Nijo osam mistahi ubatanwa. Nikan ayamihewisika hachikasuwini, eoko mamawiyes ka abateyitchikatek etaliki ayamihewikekwaya, tehikema eka sikahatchikasuk nama wikkach kilaki wabamanaw Kijemanito, k'o itasowet J.-C.: "Awiyak eka kittwam niitawikitije nipiy otihi" mina Meyosiyit-Manitowa otihi, namawiya kita "pitukew kijikowotenawiyinik." (S. Joan., 3.) Ekwa iyaskutch ayamihewikasaibamakewin mina mistahi Abatan, ayis ekuta otihi piko ki ka ki kassihamasunanow matchi ittiwina, ka sikhatchikasuyak mwestaa piyastahuyuki.

Jesus-Christ mana maka ka ki ojilat kakriyaw ayamihewinanatawihuwina, maka ki pakitinama-wew ayamihewiyiniwa, e kapawiskboltsat wiyawaw piko e ki oyimat kita kilchitolakeyit. "Tabis," "koteh J.-C. opamistagana ni ga wi-itakimikokonan ayisiyiniw, mina Kijemanitowa o kitchi-
"twamiyiwa o mikinnwasiwewok, kiyan ni
ga iteyimikawinän." (1 Cor., 4.) Kakiyaw ka
ki kwayask ayamihewiyiniwihiitwaw, cokonj
piko miyikowisiwok kita otamittatjik ayamihe-
winanatwihuwinna mina kita, totamowatjik ayi-
siyiniwa. Kispin awiyak ketchitotatji, peyak aya-
mihewinanatwihuwin, e megwa miyo-kanata-
tehâkwet, otchistnamkowisiw' kitchi wi otillikut
tânisî elakitchikâteyik eoko totchikasuwin. Kis-
pin maka awiyak ketchitotatji, megwatch e ki-
kiskâkul matchi illiwin, mistahi mayitolâsuw,
e mayeyittamowâl Tebeyitchikeyit, o miyo totâ-
kewiniyiwa.

N'tawâssimissilik, mamitoneyittamuk mitoni
âneyigok mana kitchi kakwe wâweyiltwasuyek
miyotehewin, miyowâlisiwin, miyomawikkâtis-
suwin, taltwaw wa-kitchitotchikasuyeku. Wi-
nanâskomik ki Kijemanitomiwaw J.C. e ki
ojittamâkoyek eokoni kitchi ijitttwâwina. Na-
nâskomik e ki kâskittamâkoyek eokoni miyo-
abaljitjigana, kita otawiwiniwâyckâtchî pikku-
huâyck kitchi kijikôk. Ayamihewinanatwihu-
win ka kitchi totâkîwiyek mana,, ekuta olchi-
akameyinuk ayiwâkes kita miyo-ayiwiyek, ayi-
wâkes kitchi tapwewokeyitlamêk mina kitchi
sâkittâyek, ayiwâkes kitchi sâkihiyek J.C.,
mina k'itj'ayisiyiniwâwok, ayiwâkes kitchi kus-
tamek matchi totamowin, matchi miloneyitchig-
gan mina matchi pikiskwewin. Ekawiya wi-nas-
pitakuk aniki ot ayamiha'wok, o ata kakiyipa kit-
chi tochikasutwaw tiyakwatch ajipiko matchi
ayiwiwok. Anotch awah ka ki n'tawi-ayamihewi-
saskamot; sasly ka matchitoneet. Tchikemleoko-
wik ayisiyiniwok namawiya tapwe kwayaskweyit-
tamok ka totakik. Pikonata waskitch tebiyak kis-
kinowatehi ayittiwok, namawiya tapwe otehiwak
maniloweyittamok ayamihewinanatawihuwina.
Kiskisik, ot ayamiha'lik, tattwaw ka kitchitotaka-
wiyek, eyigok nipiyeku, ki ka otchi wiyasuwat-
tikowaw Tebeyitchiket tchi tipahamohitek. Kis-
kisik mina kiyawaw eka wikkach ka n'taweeyit-
tamek kita kitchitotakawiyek, tcheskwa mistahi
ki ka wa'waneytumohikowaw o kitchiwiyasu-
we-Manito.

N'taweatch, eyikokkweyimotan kita kaskilla-
musuyak kakiyipa ayamihewinanatawihuwina,
tehi miyo iyinikkahikowwisitwaw kit atchakono-
wok waskitaskamik, tcheskwa kakike kitchi
pimatisitjik kitchi kijikok. P. E. I.
5me INSTRUCTION.

DE LA PRIÈRE; COMMENT IL FAUT PRIER.

Domine, doce nos orare.

(St. Luc, 13.)

Tebeitchikeyan kiskinohamawinän tchi iji mawimustchikeydak.

N'tawassimissitik, ekwa anotch ki wi kiskinohamatinawaw kekotowiniwik mawimustchikewin. Ot ayamiha ayisisiyiniw, keskeyittaki kitchi iji tapwewokeyittak, mina kwayaskweyittaki Kijemanitowa ot itasowewiniyiwa, wawatch mitoni nissitaweyittaki etattiniyiki mina etabatanyiki ayanihewinanatâwiuwina, piko kitchi ketchinâheyittak eyigok e n'taweyittamâkowisit kita mawimustchiket, ekuta oichi kita mantolamâwât Tebeyitchikeyit, tchi nisokkamâkut. Eka nisokkamâkowisitji, namawiya kwayask kita ki ayamilhewitâpwewokeyittam, namawiya kita ki totamwew ejisikkimikuî Tebeyitchikeyit, mina eka miyikowisitji, namawiya kita ki kanâtji-otitlikuw ayanihewinanatâwiuwina. Eokotchi ekwa ki wi wittamâtinawaw eyigok e âbatak mawimuštchikewin. Nantolamâwâlâk mâmawi
weyottawimâyak, niya kwayask kita kakwe ka-
keskimitakwaw, ekusi kiyawaw, kitchi wi kwa-
yaskweyittamek, eokoni kakeskikemowina; ke
miyitakuk, mawimustchikewin otchi.

Kijemanito e miyikoyak ot ijitwâwin, neweyak iji ki iteyimikonow. tchi ayittiwayayak, wa-
totamwayaki, wiyasuwewinik, tapwewokeyittamowininik, totchikasuwinik, mawimustchikewininik. Ayis J.-C. ispi e pakitinamâket o kiskino-
hamâkewin, ki itasitchikew tehi wiyasuwewini-
wiyik, tchi tapwewokeyittamowiniwiyik, tchi
totchikasuwininiwiyik; mina tchi mawimustchike-
winiwiyik. Sasay nisto e ki tipotamatakwaw,
ekwa ni wi mamiskoten, anima iskweyâtk ka
wetjikâtek, mawimustchikewin ka itâkâniwik.

"Kijemanito a nanâgataweyimit espitchote-
hik, eji Kijemanitoweyittâkusit, e nanâskomit
mina e nantotamât pimâtisiwin atchâk otchi mina
miyâk iji," eoko anima mawimustchikewin,
ka itwek. Niyananweyâk iji kita ki nanâkata-
weyimaw Kijemanito. lo. E omânîtomimâyak
mina e mâmitjimâyak. 2o. E âtjimâyak wâ-
wâtkh e atotamwayak o kisteyittâkusiwîn, o mâ-
mattâwisîwin, ot iyinisîwin, o kwayaskâtîsiwin,
o kijewâtîsiwin, kakiyaw o miyo ayîwiwîna: 4o.
E nanâskomâyak kakiyaw otchi ka ki miyo to-
âkoyak, mina eyâbîtch sakamo ka kitimâkéyi-
mikoyak. 4o. E pakitinamawayak kit ayisiyiniwininow, kit ayawininowa, kit ittiwininowa, ki kwatakittawininowa, kiyaawinow, kit atchakonow, piyis kakiyaw kit ijiwininow. 5o. E nantotamawayak, eji kwitamawayak kekway eji ot atchakowayak mina eji o wiyowiwayak. Eoko tattwayak ka pakuseyimit Kijemanito mawimustatji. Wiya mana maka kakiyaw kekwaya tibeyittam, pimatisiwin mina kitchi opimatjihwit, tibeyittam, ekusi e mekit, kispin nantotamatji. Kispin ki ntaweyittenanow kita otinamakoyak kekway, eji kitimakisiswayak, nandotamawalak espitchotehiwayak, kitchi wi kitimakittakoyak. Eoko ki ka totenanow, kispin nitta mawimustchikeyak.

Nijweyaganwa mewimustchikewina, peyak, kimotch mitoneyitchigananimawimustchikewin, ekusi kutak waskitch ka pikiskwewiniwiw mawimustchikewin. Mitoneyitchigananimawimustchikewin, eoko mitehik nayesto k'otchipayik. Ka pikiskwewiniwak mawimustchikewin, eokoanima ka totchikatek miteyanik otchi. K'o pituteyittakwaki eokoni nijo mawimustchikewina, peyak wabatchikatew mawimustckikewin, pettatchikatew, pikiskwemottaniwiw, ekusi wiya kutak, nama nokwan, nayesto mitoneyitchiganik ikkin, e nanagataweyittamitehikowisik. Maka kita
kakwe pisiskeyittakaniniw mawimustchikewin,
ka pikiskwemottak, tchi miwasik, piko kisik
kitchi mitoneyitchiganiwiw, mileh asitji mit'on
tchi witjetunagaki. Tchikema kispin mit'on
nayesto mawimustchikaniniw, eka e abatjittak
initeh, nayowisinaniwiw, pikouata kakayesimawimustchikewin. Kijemanito assenam, lasipwa
k'o itwel: "Eokonik ayisiniwok ni mamit-
jimikwok ot oniwak tebiyak, maka otehiwaw
'wayo asteyu." (Math. 15.)

Mitoneyitchigani-mawimustchikewin, eoko ma-
mawiyes mewasik, mina missawatch mamawiyes
iyabatak, wawatch watakame espayik, kispin
oti espitchotehik e totamik, mina wayatchaweit-
tamik. Tapwe mana maka, ekusi iji, nawatch
mamitoneyinisunaniwiw, nawatch mitjimeyi-
maw Kijemanito, mina nawatch kijatakaniniwa
kekwaya, ka nantotamik. Awiyak mitoni otehik
otchi e mawimustchiket nit'a nantottakowisiw:
"Ayis, Kijemanito namawiya wi nandotam pi-
kiskwewina, ka otchipayiyik mitonik piko otchi,
maka'anihi o'am mitehik ka otchipayiyik." (S.
Cyprien de Orat.) Ata mitoni e miwasik, e aba-
tak, mina e wetlasik mitoneyitchigani-mawimus-
tchikewin, namawiya eokotchi eka askaw kitchi
mawimuschikek mutchiton. Tchikema e njwe-
yakihuyak, eji ot atchakuyak, mina eji o wiyo-
wiya, nakiskanomagan, eji o wiyoowiya, kita mamitjimayak Tebeyitchiket, mewimutawayaki.

En'taweyittak miteh namawiya atawiya ataweyittam piteyaniy, kitchi mamitchimayak, kitchi nanaskomayak, mina kitchi nantottamayak o nisokkamakewina. Maka sokki iteyittam mitehik kitchi otchi sipwepayiyik kakiyaw ittiwina, eka ekusi espayiyiki, namawiya, kita ki miweyittam. Tasipwa k'o itwet J.-C.: "Mitehik otchi kita o Manitomimaw Kijemanito." (Jean, 4) "Kakike mitehik otchi, tchi mawimustchikek." (Ephes., 6.)

Ekwa ki ka kakwe-kiskinohamatinawaw tanesi kekwaya, kitchi nantotamayak Kijemato newimustawayaki. J.-C. ki ki wittamakonow eokoyu o miyowatjimowinik, e itwet: "Nikan n'taweyittamuk kitchi otittayek Kijemanito, mina kita olittikuwayek o miyowatisiwin." (Math. 6.) Anisikis nistam kitchi nantotamayak Kijemato kakike pimatisiwin kitchi kijikok, asitji nisokkamakewin, kitchi otittamik eoko. Eoko mamawiyes [nikan kitchi n'taweyittamik, pitus kekway, olak piko kita nantotamik. Eokotchi k'o itasinahikatek Manitowimasinahiganik: "Kakike kita mawimustchikaniwiw." (Luc. 18.) Kitchi kaskittamasuyak eoko niyank miyo kekway kitchi kijikok, k'o wittamakowisiyak,
tchi akameyimoyak, "tchi nantonikeyak, tchi pakamahikeyak iskwâtemik." (Math., 7.) Ekuta eyâbitch otchi Tebeyimikoyak, k'o asotamâkoyak, "piko iji kekwây nantotamâwayaki Ottâwiya e wiwòwinik otchi, kita totamâkoyak" (Jean, 14.) Eoko kakike pimatisiwin otchi kita mâmaâwiyes nikâneyittamak, mewimustchikeya-ki mana.

Ekwa, n't'awâssimissitik, m'westas ki ka ki nantotamâwanow Kijemanito pimatisiwin ota assik, mina asitji kakiyaw kekwaya tchi otchi mi-yopayiyak. Eokotchi eyâkkusiki, mayâkupayiki, wâwâneyittamiki, kwetâkittaki, miwâsin mina âbatan, tchi nantotamâwayak Tebeyitchi-ket, kita wi miyikoyak, ka iji n'tâweyittamâ-wayak. Ekusi mana mewimustchikek; piko kisik omisi kitchi iteyittamik: "Kispin iteyitta-ki Kijemanito...." "kispin kiskeyittaki, tchi âbatjihikuwok, ka nantotamâwok." Tchikema âtit ayisiyiniwok mewimustawâtwâwi Kijemani-towa; kispia eka miyikutwaw; ka iji n'taweyittakik, kaskeyittamok, iyimowok, appo iyiewuhuwok. Tapwe kakebâtisiwok; tiyakwatch eka nanâskumâtwaw. Ot âtchâkowâwa ituke otchi, mana piko eka o nantottâkowisittâwaw. Ekusi kit ikawinâwaw kiyawaw ka iteyittamek, mewimustchikeyekû: "Nainawiya ki kiske-
yittenawaw k'oji nantotamayek." (Marc, 20.) Kiyanow, e pakwanowisiyak, namawiya ki kiskeyittenanow, tanisi ke ayitliyak tcheskwa, mina tanisi ke iji miyo abatjihikuyak kekway nikani; eokotchi mitchetwaw ki nantotenanow kekway, "mana piko ni ga miyo abatjihikun," e iteyittamak, maka namesani, ki tchisihunanow, ki miyikoyakubane, ki ka mitatenanow, nipiyaku. Eokotchi, ot ayamihatik, mewimustawayeku Kijemanito, kekway waskitaskamik tchi wi otiuamakoyek, takki omisi kisik iteyittamuk: "Nolta, kiya, ki kiskeyitten tanisi kekway ke miyo abatjihikuyan, wi miyin anotch ka nantotamatan, kispin kitchi ki miyo abatjihut n'tatchak, kispin maka eka kitchi ayiwakes sakihitan otchi, ckawiya n'lawatch miyin." Namawiya wikkath ki ka mitatenawaw ekusi e ileyimayek kakiyaw kekway ka kwayaskweyittak; ayis wiya mitoni sabeeyittam tanisi kekway ke itabatjihikuwayek; naspitchi mina kljewatisiw, eteyittaki mana, ki ka kitimakittakowaw. Keskeyittaki tchi miyo abatjittawayek, ki ka miykowaw miyo ayawin ota askik, ekuta otchi tchi kaskittamasuyek kakike pimatisiwin kitchi kijikok. Namawiya kita wawaneyittam kita iji kitimakeyimikoyek; ekawiya mana osam kaskeyittamuk, wa mawimustchikeyekeku, k'ottawi-
now ka asamât piyesissa, ka pamihât kakiyaw pijiskiwa, wâwis ituke kita pisiskeyimew ayisi-yiniwa, kispin miyâmitoneyimikuiji. Ekusi wi mamitoneyittamuk nando ayittiyeku: "Tebiyâk miyo kaskihuyân, kitchi wâbamak kitche kijikok;" nista ka jji nantottestamatak waw ni tebik otchi. P. E. I.
